cases.name: Radio player built in React using Sveriges Radio API
cases.description: In this Radio Player App I used the Sveriges Radio API to fetch information about the radio channels and fetch playable audio stream urls. Using React fetch()-method I got a JSON from the Sveriges Radio API and render a list of channels with playable streams, showing the station name, image, and colour keys.
